backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with user profiles, doctors, hospitals, hire requests, notifications, and access-control‑protected CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature-to-file mapping metadata for UI modules, themes, and workflows with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of several frontend utility and UI files including analytics data, polling hook, and global CSS.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Standard HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application router, global layout, theming, and routes for doctor, hospital, and admin modules.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Respon: Renders responsive bar and line charts using basic SVG and Tailwind styling.
frontend/src/components/doctor/AppliedJo: Displays hire requests with accept/reject actions and status badges using workflow state.
frontend/src/components/doctor/DoctorPro: Shows a doctor's profile with animated specialty icon, availability toggle, and edit dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/doctor/EditDocto: Dialog for editing a doctor profile, syncing form state with stored profile and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/doctor/MatchAler: Popup dialog that shows unread match notifications and marks them read on close.
frontend/src/components/doctor/Notificat: Displays a list of notifications with unread counts and includes the match alert popup.
frontend/src/components/doctor/Specializ: Specialization dropdown that briefly shows a heart animation when a selection changes.
frontend/src/components/hospital/DoctorL: Grid of doctor cards with details and a hire button that triggers workflow requests.
frontend/src/components/hospital/DoctorS: Filtering UI applying search and multiple dropdown filters to a doctor list.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation links that adapt to session role plus logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App wrapper layout containing header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/payments/Invoice: Utility that generates and downloads a text invoice file for a payment record.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Full-screen success animation shown after a completed payment.
frontend/src/components/shared/ImageUplo: Image upload component with previews, validation, and remove/change actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and returns an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulatedPolling.t: Implements a simple interval-based polling effect placeholder.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom light/dark theme CSS variables for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin metrics and navigation actions, redirecting non-admin users away.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDoctorsPag: Displays a table of doctors for admins and supports approving or rejecting registrations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHospitalsP: Admin page listing hospitals with approval actions and role-protected access.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPaymentsPa: Admin dashboard for filtering, sorting, and reviewing payment records with revenue stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSubscripti: Admin interface to create, edit, and delete subscription plans using a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorDashboar: Doctor dashboard showing profile, applied jobs, and notifications with role check.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorLoginPag: Doctor login form that sets session data and redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorRegister: Doctor registration flow with multi-step details, OTP verification, and profile setup.
frontend/src/pages/hospital/HospitalAnal: Hospital analytics dashboard showing insights and charts, gated by hospital session.
frontend/src/pages/hospital/HospitalDash: Renders the hospital dashboard with emergency mode, doctor stats, filters, and doctor list, redirecting if not authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/hospital/HospitalRegi: Provides a hospital registration form that sets a session and redirects to the dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/hospital/HospitalSubs: Handles subscription plan selection, payments, auto-renew toggling, and displays payment history with success animation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero, features, and call‑to‑action sections.
frontend/src/state/adminData.ts: Zustand store containing admin-managed doctors, hospitals, subscription plans, payments, and approval/update actions.
frontend/src/state/analyticsSampleData.t: Zustand store providing sample analytics data for emergency trends, doctor availability, and summary insights.
frontend/src/state/doctorProfile.ts: Persistent Zustand store managing a doctor’s profile and availability toggling.
frontend/src/state/emergencyMode.ts: Zustand store controlling global emergency mode state and toggle action.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Zustand store for app notifications with add, mark-as-read, and unread count tracking.
frontend/src/state/seedData.ts: Zustand store supplying static seed doctor data for search and display.
frontend/src/state/session.ts: Persistent Zustand session store managing user role, identity, and session updates.
Persistent Zustand store handling subscription selection, auto-renew, and payment history.
frontend/src/state/workflows.ts: Zustand store managing hire requests and notifications for doctor-hospital workflows.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended color system, custom animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state with schema version, summary, architecture notes, image requirements, and a list of existing implemented features.
